post.text: Share this if last night made you proud to be a Democrat. #DemsInPhilly

comment.author: Alyson
comment.text: I don't understand stand why you all put Hillary down like that. Do you all have prof she lies and is such a bad person as you say. In my mind all of you putting down Hillary and judge her because she is a women what are you scared of she could make a difference? Tell me one good reason why TRUMP should be president... when all he talks about is build a wall. Keep Mexicans and Muslims out wtf. My kids are mexican and I am American so what he's going to kick my kids out too. He also says that Mexicans are the ones taking work away from the Americans. I Wana see a American do what Mexicans do for a living you all would not last one day!! And most of the crime is because of mexicans. Come on so americans don't comit crimes?? I can't believe all you people complain and put people down. Look in the mirror are you perfect??? I will vote for Hillary not because she I a woman because she is smart enough to do the job. And with more experience then TRUMP.. So go ahead and vote for trump and when he leads us to war don't complain.. After all TRUMP doesn't care about us he just wants our votes...

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: Trump is nothing but a dangerous, narcissistic shyster and clearly too many ignorant, hateful sheeple are falling for it. We must not let him win.

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: Well then go praise Trump on his page if you love him so much in spite of his narcissistic hate!

replies.author: Alyson
replies.text: Old enough!!everyone can play the game he said or she said.. if it was a fact that they stole furniture from the White House they would be in prison don't you think?? Haha that's a good one.. and if Bill Clinton slepped with Monica Lewinsky well that's his problem.. not the world's.. I know my history thank you!! It's sad there are so many people in this world love to live off of gossip!!
